snippet: A former East Haven, Conn., police officer charged in an investigation of mistreatment of Latinos was sentenced to four months in prison on Wednesday.
abstract: John Miller, former police officer in East Haven, Conn, who was charged in investigation of mistreatment of Latinos, is sentenced to four months in prison for using unreasonable force during arrest; becomes last of four officers sentenced in case.
lead_paragraph: A former East Haven, Conn., police officer charged in an investigation of mistreatment of Latinos was sentenced to four months in prison on Wednesday.

headline.main: Last of 4 Connecticut Officers Sentenced in Police Bias Case
headline.print_headline: Last of 4 Connecticut Officers Sentenced in Police Bias Case
